typ:
Activation with Microsoft Toolkit (as admin)
http://image.bayimg.com/25ff5b4f975190b19a41b4ec7ecc19732acb659a.jpg

CMD as Admin:
slmgr -upk (press enter)
slmgr -cpky  (press enter) [clear the key from the registry]
slmgr -ipk MTWNQ-CKDHJ-3HXW9-Q2PFX-WB2HQ (press enter)
